name: Ragged child
message: Thank you, for listening, for caring

name: Traveler
message: It's okay, I know you have suffered a lot

name: Ragged child
message: Normally people don't care about children in this zone

name: Ragged child
message: The lack of money make impossible for kids to live in good conditions

name: Traveler
message: You are the first kid I've seen in this place, there are more?

name: Ragged child
message: There are a lot, but most of us preffer to be hidden

name: Ragged child
message: Life have never been easy, but nowadays it seems like we struggle more and more

name: Ragged child
message: Money is everything in this city... power is in bad people's hands

name: Ragged child
message: If you don't produce you aren't useful, and if you don't have money you have no voice

name: Traveler
message: How could that be... I'm trying to find out what happened here, everything... is different

name: Ragged child
message: I wish you a lot of luck with that, maybe you can find out more in the workers zone

name: Traveler
message: It's been a long time since I visit Valdir... All... is different now, even people

name: Traveler
message: Thank you I'll go there now then, be safe kid

name: ERROR
message: If you're seeing this message something bad happened
